",{"type":"p","key":"2","props":{"children":"英文例句：His bluff manner often offended people, but they appreciated his honesty."}},"
"]}},{"type":"StudyNote","key":null,"props":{"className":"","note":{"type":"Symbol(react.fragment)","key":null,"props":{"children":"I don't believe you heard a word of it."}},"children":[{"type":"p","key":"0","props":{"children":"这个短语的意思是说话者觉得对方没有听懂或没有认真听自己所说的话。带有怀疑和失望的情绪。"}},"
",{"type":"p","key":"2","props":{"children":"英文例句：I just spent an hour explaining the plan to you, and now you're asking questions that show you didn't hear a word of it."}},"
"]}},{"type":"StudyNote","key":null,"props":{"className":"","note":{"type":"Symbol(react.fragment)","key":null,"props":{"children":"Shouldn't I have said that I've not been married?"}},"children":[{"type":"p","key":"0","props":{"children":"用户短语的大意是对之前自己没有说出自己未婚状态的行为感到疑惑或后悔。"}},"

It was a ",{"type":"b","key":null,"props":{"children":"personal touch"}},"."]}},"children":[{"type":"p","key":"0","props":{"children":"个人化的接触或处理，通常是为了增加互动的亲密感和个性化。"}},"
",{"type":"p","key":"2","props":{"children":"英文例句：The handwritten thank-you note added a personal touch to the gift."}},"
"]}},{"type":"StudyNote","key":null,"props":{"className":"","note":{"type":"Symbol(react.fragment)","key":null,"props":{"children":"You shouldn't play that card to often,"}},"children":[{"type":"p","key":"0","props":{"children":"这个短语的意思是不要频繁使用某一技巧、策略或借口，因为这种行为可能逐渐失去效果或者被视为不当。"}},"
",{"type":"p","key":"2","props":{"children":"英文例句：

"]}},{"type":"StudyNote","key":null,"props":{"className":"","note":{"type":"Symbol(react.fragment)","key":null,"props":{"children":["You'll end up the non-playing captain in the ",{"type":"b","key":null,"props":{"children":"cricket game"}}," of life."]}},"children":[{"type":"p","key":"0","props":{"children":"“Cricket game”在这里比喻生活或人生，就像是一场比赛或游戏。在这个短语中，你可能最终会成为一个“非上场的队长”，即指虽然拥有一定的权威或责任，但实际上并不直接参与具体的活动或决策。"}},"
",{"type":"p","key":"2","props":{"children":"英文例句：In the cricket game of life, we sometimes need to be strategic and let others take the lead, focusing on coordinating efforts."}},"
"]}},{"type":"StudyNote","key":null,"props":{"className":"","note":{"type":"Symbol(react.fragment)","key":null,"props":{"children":["a ",{"type":"b","key":null,"props":{"children":"card-carrying"}}," communist"]}},"children":[{"type":"p","key":"0","props":{"children":"“card-carrying”在这里指的是一个人坚定或正式地属于某个团体，尤其是指某个政治团体。此表述有时带有调侃或强调的意味，表明此人不仅名义上，而是实际参与并支持该组织的理念。"}},"
",{"type":"p","key":"2","props":{"children":"英文例句：
"He is a card-carrying communist, always advocating for workers' rights and social equality.""}},"
"]}},{"type":"StudyNote","key":null,"props":{"className":"","note":{"type":"Symbol(react.fragment)","key":null,"props":{"children":"Am I right you are as fascinated as I am "}},"children":[{"type":"p","key":"0","props":{"children":"此短语用于询问对方是否和自己一样对某事物感到着迷。"}},"
",{"type":"p","key":"2","props":{"children":"Example: "Am I right you are as fascinated as I am by the mysterious universe?""}},"
"]}},{"type":"StudyNote","key":null,"props":{"className":"","note":{"type":"Symbol(react.fragment)","key":null,"props":{"children":"the mythical door that leads out of time and space into"}},"children":[{"type":"p","key":"0","props":{"children":"这个短语提到一个神话中的门，传说中它能够带领人们离开时间和空间，进入一个未知的领域。这样的概念通常存在于科幻或奇幻文学中，象征着无尽的冒险或神秘的境地。"}},"
",{"type":"p","key":"2","props":{"children":"英文例句：In the ancient legends, it is said that whoever steps through the mythical door that leads out of time and space into the beyond, will embark on an eternal journey."}},"
"]}},{"type":"StudyNote","key":null,"props":{"className":"","note":{"type":"Symbol(react.fragment)","key":null,"props":{"children":["Maybe you are, ",{"type":"b","key":null,"props":{"children":"for that matter"}},"."]}},"children":[{"type":"p","key":"0","props":{"children":""for that matter" 可以用来强调前面提到的情况对同一问题的适用性，表示进一步推论或延伸适用的意思。"}},"
",{"type":"p","key":"2","props":{"children":"英文例句：Cats are not the only animals that can be independent; dogs, for that matter, can also be quite self-sufficient."}},"
"]}},{"type":"StudyNote","key":null,"props":{"className":"","note":{"type":"Symbol(react.fragment)","key":null,"props":{"children":"enclose (envelope)"}},"children":[{"type":"p","key":"0","props":{"children":"“enclose (envelope)” 是指将某物装入信封或其他容器中，以便保护或传递。"}},"
",{"type":"p","key":"2","props":{"children":"英文例句：Please enclose the documents in the envelope before mailing them."}},"
"]}},{"type":"StudyNote","key":null,"props":{"className":"","note":{"type":"Symbol(react.fragment)","key":null,"props":{"children":"write me off as a nut"}},"children":[{"type":"p","key":"0","props":{"children":"短语“write me off as a nut”意思是把某人认为或视作是一个怪人或疯子，不再认真对待他们的话或行动。"}},"
",{"type":"p","key":"2","props":{"children":"英文例句：After I shared my unconventional ideas at the meeting, they just wrote me off as a nut."}},"
"]}},{"type":"StudyNote","key":null,"props":{"className":"","note":{"type":"Symbol(react.fragment)","key":null,"props":{"children":"start the morning with"}},"children":[{"type":"p","key":"0","props":{"children":"短语“start the morning with”意为“以......开始早晨”。通常用于描述清晨做的第一件事情，可以是喝咖啡、锻炼、吃早餐等。"}},"
",{"type":"p","key":"2","props":{"children":"英文例句：I like to start the morning with a cup of coffee to feel energized for the day ahead."}},"
"]}},{"type":"StudyNote","key":null,"props":{"className":"","note":{"type":"Symbol(react.fragment)","key":null,"props":{"children":"Pictures do not tax the brain, they say."}},"children":[{"type":"p","key":"0","props":{"children":"这句话的意思是说，看图片不需要太多的脑力或思考，相比于阅读或其他需要深入思考的活动。"}},"
",{"type":"p","key":"2","props":{"children":"英文例句：
"After a long day at work, I prefer looking at pictures because pictures do not tax the brain, they say.""}},"
"]}},{"type":"StudyNote","key":null,"props":{"className":"","note":{"type":"Symbol(react.fragment)","key":null,"props":{"children":"Walking a little aimlessly --"}},"children":[{"type":"p","key":"0","props":{"children":"这个短语指的是没有明确目的或方向地走动，可能只是随意走走，享受心情或者思考问题。"}},"
",{"type":"p","key":"2","props":{"children":"英文例句：After the meeting, I found myself walking a little aimlessly around the park, lost in thought."}},"

",{"type":"p","key":"2","props":{"children":"English example: "They set up a picnic beside a river to enjoy the scenic view and the sound of flowing water.""}},"
"]}},{"type":"StudyNote","key":null,"props":{"className":"","note":{"type":"Symbol(react.fragment)","key":null,"props":{"children":["a garden ",{"type":"b","key":null,"props":{"children":"enclose by a high wall"}}]}},"children":[{"type":"p","key":"0","props":{"children":"“enclose by a high wall”指的是被高墙围起来，说明墙的高度阻挡了进入或离开这个区域。"}},"
",{"type":"p","key":"2","props":{"children":"Example: The monastery garden was enclose by a high wall, ensuring privacy and tranquility for the monks to meditate."}},"

",{"type":"p","key":"2","props":{"children":"英文例句：

",{"type":"p","key":"2","props":{"children":"英文例句：She gently placed one beautiful rosebud in a small vase by the window."}},"

",{"type":"p","key":"2","props":{"children":"英文例句：She had to stretch out one hand to grab the book from the top shelf."}},"
"]}},{"type":"StudyNote","key":null,"props":{"className":"","note":{"type":"Symbol(react.fragment)","key":null,"props":{"children":"pluck the bud"}},"children":[{"type":"p","key":"0","props":{"children":""掐掉花蕾"或“摘芽”是指在植物的生长过程中，把花蕾或嫩芽摘掉，通常是为了控制植物的生长形状或者刺激更多的花朵或果实生长。"}},"
",{"type":"p","key":"2","props":{"children":"英文例句：
"The gardener decided to pluck the buds from the rose bush to encourage more blooms later in the season.""}},"
"]}},{"type":"StudyNote","key":null,"props":{"className":"","note":{"type":"Symbol(react.fragment)","key":null,"props":{"children":"pleasant plains"}},"children":[{"type":"p","key":"0","props":{"children":"“Pleasant Plains”是一个地名，通常作为城镇、乡村或社区的名称。“Pleasant”意味着宜人的或令人愉悦的，“Plains”指平原，因此可以理解为风景优美、地势平坦的地方。"}},"
",{"type":"p","key":"2","props":{"children":"英文例句：
"Pleasant Plains is known for its beautiful landscapes and friendly community.""}},"
"]}},{"type":"StudyNote","key":null,"props":{"className":"","note":{"type":"Symbol(react.fragment)","key":null,"props":{"children":"price of fame"}},"children":[{"type":"p","key":"0","props":{"children":""成名的代价"意味着获得名誉或名声所需付出的代价或面临的挑战，可能包括隐私丧失、压力增大、或与人际关系的变化。"}},"
",{"type":"p","key":"2","props":{"children":"英文例句：The price of fame for many celebrities often includes losing their privacy and constantly being in the public eye."}},"
"]}},{"type":"StudyNote","key":null,"props":{"className":"","note":{"type":"Symbol(react.fragment)","key":null,"props":{"children":["she is ",{"type":"b","key":null,"props":{"children":"presumptuous"}}]}},"children":[{"type":"p","key":"0","props":{"children":"“冒昧的”或“专横的”。这个词通常用来形容一个人不考虑到他人感受或权利的情况下大胆行事。"}},"
",{"type":"p","key":"2","props":{"children":"英文例句：It was presumptuous of her to assume she could just take over the project without consulting anyone."}},"
"]}},{"type":"StudyNote","key":null,"props":{"className":"","note":{"type":"Symbol(react.fragment)","key":null,"props":{"children":["Americans don't understand about ",{"type":"b","key":null,"props":{"children":"inhibition"}},"."]}},"children":[{"type":"p","key":"0","props":{"children":""抑制"是指遏制情感、冲动或行为的能力。通常用来描述个体在特定情况下控制自己冲动的表现。"}},"

"]}},{"type":"StudyNote","key":null,"props":{"className":"","note":{"type":"Symbol(react.fragment)","key":null,"props":{"children":"I amused that"}},"children":[{"type":"p","key":"0","props":{"children":"这个短语是指一个人感到自己被某事或某种想法逗乐或感到有趣。"}},"

",{"type":"p","key":"2","props":{"children":"英文例句：She set such store by his opinion that she wouldn't make any decision without consulting him first."}},"
